features.name: Admin Authentication
features.description: Admin login system with Zustand state management

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with stats cards and analytics charts

features.name: User Management
features.description: User list, search, filter, ban/unban, verify, add points, delete users

features.name: Template Management
features.description: Template list, approve/reject, bulk operations, delete templates

features.name: Creator Management
features.description: Creator list, approve/reject applications, ban/unban, verify, process withdrawals

features.name: Transaction Management
features.description: Transaction list, search, refund, export CSV

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Revenue analytics, user growth, template performance, creator performance

features.name: Support Tickets
features.description: Ticket management, status updates, close tickets

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components from Shadcn UI

features.name: API Service
features.description: Admin API service for backend communication

features.name: Types
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for admin panel

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Utility functions including Tailwind class merging
